body.name: SEBAMED Feminine Intimate Wash pH 3.8 for Microflora Balance with Aloe Vera Mild Organic Based Daily Vaginal Wash Feminine Hygiene 6.8 Fluid Ounces (200 Milliliters), Clear (3247350.0)
features: The Sebamed Feminine Intimate Wash pH 3.8 is specially formulated to keep vaginal flora balanced while getting rid of bacteria
Recommended by dermatologists and gynecologists alike, our Feminine Intimate Wash is balanced at pH 3.8 to keep vaginal flora healthy
Made with organic ingredients, this vaginal wash meets females' unique hygienic needs, fighting odor-causing bacteria and infection.
Dermatologist developed, this organically-based wash supports the natural balance of female intimate micro flora to help protect against infections and odor formation
Gentle enough for daily use, this non-irritating formula naturally soothes and moisturizes with botanical bisabolol and aloe vera.
body.description: Soap-free feminine intimate wash for gentle external cleansing with a pH value of 3.8 specific for the microflora balance. 100% soap and alkali free with natural organic derivative tenside complex for extra mild cleansing. Specifically formulated and clinically tested to meet the needs of feminine hygiene for the very sensitive skin of the genital area.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Feminine Intimate Wash Soothing formula: Bisabolol and aloe vera helps soothe sensitive skin pH balanced: Formulated to match pH value of feminine intimate area Moisturizing ingredients: Aloe barbadensis stabilizes skin’s moisture content Promotes healthy skin: Supports skin’s protective barrier functions and natural healing process Free from irritants: Free of soap, alkali, and color additives Ultra mild: Natural organic tenside complex for extra mild cleansing Protection: Supports ecological balance of micro-flora Hypoallergenic fragrance: Therapy-supportive intimate hygiene Daily use: Non-irritating formula gentle enough for daily use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent, gentle soap that doesn’t irritate but cleans. I’ve tried lots of soaps, including lume, this is better. I over use it because it’s hard to squeeze out of bottle but I don’t care. It’s not heavily scented and is perfect for ppl that are super sensitive to soaps. I tend to get irritated and itchy from everything. I’ve tried it all, queen v, honey pot, monistat, summers eve, safeguard, Irish spring. I can’t use any products, but this seems to work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Product! ☆☆☆☆☆Will buy again!
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for several years now for a feminine wash product that really does what it says with no problems. Well I found it., this here knocks my socks off! Love it ladies..You gotta try it to know. =)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Intimate soap ever
reviews.reviewText: It makes you feel so clean fresh and smelling good without being harsh to skin . It smells a bit flowery but natural in a best way possible. I understand the cost might be an issue but a little goes a long way. It leaves you clean and smelling good for hours. Can't imagine using anything else. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewText: This is great for my intimate and under arm skin. Does not irritate or dry my skin. And the scent, though odd, works with my body chemistry to keep odor down. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Washing your bits without the sting
reviews.reviewText: I have to be careful with most products I use. I can’t use normal shower washes on my bits as everything makes me sore after a while so I have changed to sensitive feminine washes. This one is nice. It’s a fairly thick, clear, gel that lathers well. You don’t need a lot to produce a lather but you do need a very gentle squeeze so as not to squirt out too much. It’s a light scent that reminds me of coconut but not overpowering, almost scent free. It works well for me. Doesn’t sting, keeps me clean and I’m happy to use. I prefer this to cannesten wash as it’s much less scented.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great product with a lovely scent, switched to this after using femfresh products for a few years which started to cause burning and irritation in the last several months, this product has made a huge difference, it moisturises and soothes, quite expensive but worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for years and I'm quite happy with it. A gynecologist had recommended it to me years ago, because of the low pH which is normal for that part of the body. Other similar products have higher pH level which can get the balance off and make you more prone to infections.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very gentle and effective againsta thrush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Bought this in an attempt to find an intimate wash that didn’t send me through the stratosphere during a recent painful bout of thrush. I’ve never suffered from it before and l was surprised at how little help there is. Water only is suggested, without going into tmi this cannot provide the necessary level of hygiene required for some people. I find l can use this wash on all but the area that remains sensitive, but l would not have been able to use it when l still had thrush. So it’s not what l am looking for but would probably suit others, l am still looking for an un intimate wash that is not scented.
